title: torch.arange cannot create torch.FloatTensor of size 13
body_html:
• OS: Ubuntu 17.10
  • PyTorch version: 0.3.1
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): conda
  • Python version: 3.6.4
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: -
  • GPU models and configuration: -
import torch as th
th.arange(0, 1.1, 0.1)
th.arange(0, 1.2, 0.1)
th.arange(0, 1.3, 0.1)
